abstract: Those familiar with the career of the Knicks legend Willis Reed would not be surprised by his recent take on the N.B.A. lockout and the cancellation of early-season games. Leave it to the big man to speak for every man and especially the hard-core fan.
snippet: Those familiar with the career of the Knicks legend Willis Reed would not be surprised by his recent take on the N.B.A. lockout and the cancellation of early-season games. Leave it to the big man to speak for every man and especially the hard-core...
lead_paragraph: 11:17 p.m. | Updated Those familiar with the career of the Knicks legend Willis Reed would not be surprised by his recent take on the N.B.A. lockout and the costly cancellation of early season games.

headline.main: Knicks' Reed: Forever a Captain Among Men
